original_text: So David and his men continued along the road while Shimei was going along the hillside opposite him, cursing as he went and throwing stones at him and showering him with dirt.
korean_text: 다윗과 그의 추종자들이 길을 갈 때에 시므이는 산비탈로 따라가면서 저주하고 그를 향하여 돌을 던지며 먼지를 날리더라

sentences.original_text: So David and his men continued along the road
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 다윗과 그의 사람들은 길을 따라 계속 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: while Shimei was going along the hillside opposite him
sentences.korean_translation: 그 동안 시므이는 그의 맞은편 언덕길을 따라 가고 있었습니다
